explanation: [0-0] In a room, a little girl with two braids, wearing a green top, is drawing on a white sheet of paper on the wall. She holds a crayon in her right hand. On the wall, there are some simply drawn houses and fences. To the right of the little girl, there is a white table with a vase of flowers, a desk lamp, and some other items. A cartoon alpaca painting hangs on the wall.

[0-5] The little girl is drawing on the wall when a young woman in a pink dress walks up to her. The little girl stops drawing and looks up at the woman, who has her hands on her hips and is looking down at the little girl. The little girl then turns and runs away. The shot then cuts to the upper body of the woman, who squats down with her hands on her skirt, looks at the drawing on the wall with a helpless smile, shakes her head, and then gets up and walks away.

[5-8] The shot then cuts to a green countertop with a black four-compartment dish on it. A hand uses a red spoon to scoop some white creamy substance into the compartments. Then, a few drops of red liquid are dripped onto the creamy substance, and a wooden stick is used to mix the red liquid with the creamy substance until the color is evenly distributed. The shot then cuts to the dish now containing six different colored mixtures: pink, yellow, red, orange, green, and blue. A hand uses a wooden stick to stir the blue one, then picks up the dish.
